details.description: Plain elegance with a matte finish that hides fingerprints and splash marks. Spacious and soft-closing, solid wood drawers. Guaranteed to outlast at least 10 years of steamy showers.
details.good_to_know: GODMORGON legs are sold separately. Please note that in order to connect the sink to the top surface, a silicone kit and a vertical saw must be provided; Sold separately. Includes handles. Includes deck and strainer. Includes faucet and strainer.
